CustomField.formula: IF(Quote_Type__c <> 'Direct CPQ', IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) != 'Accepted', HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Accept", "Accept"),"_self"),IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) != 'Accepted',HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Accept", "Accept"),"_self"),NULL)), IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Approved', HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Accept", "Accept"),"_self"),IF(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c = True && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM' && TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Approved',HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/apex/Apttus_QPConfig__ProposalAccept?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Button_Accept", "Accept"),"_self"),NULL)))
CustomField.label: Accept
